text:

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text:
They are moving in on their final game of silencing Hindus. What we should do, act like Minorities of Pakistan?
#HinduLivesMatters

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text: No matter how much I try to ignore and understand the job isn't easy but isn't it that much of a duty towards the departed soul? Don't they deserve that much? Now, Hindus are getting killed, selected on their social media posts.

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text: Hiralal, Krishan, Rupesh and now Harsha, the list is too long if I mention of such killings of Hindus from the last year. Our PM can tweet for Shabana Azmi's bruise but prefers silence on the ongoing genocide of Hindus in India.

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text: If it is essential it cannot be a choice and if it is choice it cannot be essential. Much hue about nothing... https://t.co/dvWqtQpMMl

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text:
In India, Staged Political Incident >>> Life of Hindus 
#JusticeForRupesh #JusticeForLavanya #justiceforkishanbharwad https://t.co/upt1vGCtgU

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text:
Or does mean that only you are eligible to have ‘choice’ while others just be puppets accepting your whims in the name of secularism & tolerance. 6/6
#Hijab #HijabRow #HijabBan

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text:
On the school. A plain example of hypocrisy. 
Now, that you are wearing Burqua, others are wearing their sacred colors. Why shall it be considered wrong? 5/6

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text: So, you made your choice & joined a normal school but you expect it to behave like an Islamic school & allow things which are not part of the uniform. In short in the garb of “religious freedom” you are shoving your ‘choice’ & making it mandatory 4/6

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text: No one has forced you to join this school you could join an Islamic school too, to feel at home, where you can wear burqah or anything that you want. But you won't join an Islamic school cause you want ‘education’. 3/6

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text:
Every state. The essence of uniforms worn by every student of every school is to show they are part of the organization. 
You join this school knowing that it an organization with its own mind, own system & rules. 2/6

author: Aakanksha Nidhi
text:
Media is effectively calling it a ‘Hijab’ when it is in fact a ‘Burqua’. This is how special interest group turn everything into a controversy to fuel their propaganda: 
A school exists, it exists along with its rules & etiquette. This is a reality since decade in every board 1/6
